import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import "./popular_slide.css"; import placeholder from "../../utils/placeholder.png"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { popularMovies } from "../../store/popular"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const PopularSlide = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(popularMovies()) }, [dispatch]) const popular = useSelector(state => state.popular); const imageUrl = popular.backdrop_path ? `https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500${popular.backdrop_path}` : placeholder return (
‹
{popular.map((movie, i) => ( /* */

  • {movie.original_title}

    • /* */ ) )}
    ›
    ) } export default PopularSlide; {/*

    {popular.original_title}

    {popular.original_title}

    Heading One
